text: I am so humbled by all of the wonderful people who voted for me. Thank you. Congratulations to the candidates who won, I'm sorry for the many fantastic candidates who worked so hard and didn't make it. Now let's all work together to Keep America Great!
Send a Steel Magnolia to Washington to Drain the Swamp.
I wrote this for a citizen in Pender County who is working to pass a 2A resolution there.
Send a Steel Magnolia to Washington to Drain the Swamp.

I'm organizing my desk and thinking about all of the wonderful adventures I've had and the special people I have met since I filed to run on December 20th. I still have many things to do before Super Tuesday, but I want to thank all of you for coming along for the ride. The only sure thing about politics is that it is always interesting!! Good luck to all of the candidates. And if this lasts longer than next Tuesday for me, I will need all of your help. I hope to see many of you at the Trump rally on Monday. No matter what, let's help our President keep America great!!
It was great seeing Mecklenburg County Commissioner Pat Cotham at the Newsmaker Breakfast this morning. She is an expert on affordable housing.
If you are in Winston-Salem tonight stop by! Forsyth County Republican Women,    6:30 p.m.   Bib's Downtown, Hickory Room Winston-Salem, NC
I look forward to meeting the Hendersonville Republican Men's Club Breakfast this morning, 7:30-9 a.m.  Dixie Diner, 1724 Brevard Road Laurel Park, N.C.  If you are in the area please join us!
Thank you Republican Women of Cary for allowing me to speak this afternoon at your wonderful event. Trump 2020!!
I met some very nice people at the Onslow County Lincoln-Reagan Dinner.
I am looking forward to spending time tomorrow with the Republican Women of Cary and Southwestern Wake at the Lara Trump Luncheon. I hope to see you there! Prestonwood Country Club, Cary, NC.
Listening to C.L. Bryant speak at the Crystal Coast Republican Women’s Lincoln-Reagan Rally. It was a wonderfully event. Thank you for having me.

"Senator Thom Tillis is hell-bent on turning our rural communities into pipelines for cartel drug trafficking and criminal aliens." Vote him out!!  https://www.conservativereview.com/news/horowitz-senate-republicans-looking-repeat-1986-amnesty-seeking-president-trumps-support/
I look forward to meeting everyone Saturday in Jacksonville!
I am looking forward to meeting everyone Friday evening. Country Club of the Crystal Coast, Pine Knoll Shores, NC
February 17 Cumberland County GOP Convention     6:00 p.m Headquarters Library 300 Maiden Lane Fayetteville, NC  Come if you are in the area!
I am proud to have received a four star candidate rating by Grass Roots North Carolina. Which is two more than Sen. Tillis.
It was great being with Burke County citizens tonight as they passed their Second Amendment Protection Resolution.

If you are in the Charlotte area this evening drop in to Noble Smoke, 2216 Freedom Drive, from 6-8. I will be visiting our newest Republican Women's Club. https://uptowncharlotterepublicanwomen.nationbuilder.com/events
If you live near Morganton, please stop by. There may be a 2A Sanctuary Resolution tonight.
Committee to Elect Sharon Hudson.  Please share if you are in the area.
It was fun running to Lee Haywood this afternoon at the Delta Sigma Theta Sorority candidate forum. Thanks for representing the conservative viewpoint!!
I will be heading to Hendersonville tomorrow to attend the Republican Breakfast. If you live in the area please drop by. I would love to meet you. 7:30 - 9 a.m. Dixie Diner, Laurel Park.
Conservatism works! Congratulations President Trump on an outstanding State of the Union address. Visit www.ElectSharonHudson.com to learn more about U.S. Senate candidate Sharon Y. Hudson.
A hero’s return home.
I will be speaking at the Winter meeting of the North Carolina Federation of Republican Women tonight (Friday) in Winston-Salem. I hope to see you there! https://www.facebook.com/NCFRW/
Please use this cover to help advertise my campaign. Or just share the photo. Thank you! Sharon Y. Hudson, U.S. Senate Candidate.
A friend said it was time for an update. Great job Deborah Young Studio in Cornelius.
We welcome our African American friends to join the Trump Train! https://www.newsobserver.com/news/politics-government/election/article239465798.html?
There is evil in the world. This is why we need the Second Amendment. https://twitter.com/bennyjohnson/status/1219051740512866306?s=21
The web site is up! Much more to complete, but it is a start. www.ElectSharonHudson.com

“Once again, President Trump has taken a stand for the safety and security of Americans, our interests, and our allies,” Hudson said in a statement emailed to TCB. “We are grateful for his continued vigilance in identifying threats and his willingness to take action to make our world a safer place. I sincerely hope Iran does not retaliate. It would be unwise.” https://triad-city-beat.com/tillis-criticism-trumps-strike-soleimani-reckless/
Merry Christmas everyone. Stay safe out there!
